fields.description: The billing frequency of the target subscription in the ISO8601 format. Example: P1M, P3M, P1Y
fields.name: BillingFrequency

fields.description: The quantity of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into.
fields.name: Quantity

fields.description: The ID of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into. This value is not same as the value returned in Get API call and can be retrieved from Catalog API to know the product id to split into.
fields.name: TargetProductTypeId

fields.description: The ID of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into. This value is not same as the value returned in Get API call and can be retrieved from Catalog API to know the sku id to split into.
fields.name: TargetSkuId

fields.description: The term duration of the target in ISO8601 format product to which the subscription needs to be split into. Example: P1M, P1Y
fields.name: TermDuration
